members.member: A random number generator with a uniform distribution using the Mersenne Twister algorithm.
Create a new Mersenne Twister random number generator.

Create a new Mersenne Twister random number generator with a particular seed.
The seed for the generator.
''' Create a new Mersenne Twister random number generator with a ''' particular initial key. ''' ''' The initial key.
''' Generates a random number between 0 and System.UInt32.MaxValue.
''' Generates a random integer between 0 and System.Int32.MaxValue.
''' Generates a random integer between 0 and maxValue. ''' ''' The maximum value. Must be greater than zero.
''' Generates a random integer between minValue and maxValue. ''' ''' The lower bound. ''' The upper bound.
''' Generates a random floating point number between 0 and 1.

member.name: M:Football2.Scheduler.GetSchedule(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a schedule following all appropriate NFL Rules

member.name: M:Football2.Scheduler.ScheduleDivGames
member.summary: Schedules 1 Home and 1 Away game against each team in the same division

member.name: M:Football2.Scheduler.ScheduleInConfGames
member.summary: Each division plays one other division in the same conference each year.

member.name: M:Football2.Scheduler.OutofConfGames
member.summary: Schedules out of conference games for each division against another division in the other conference(ie, AFC East Vs. NFC South)

member.name: M:Football2.Scheduler.InConfFinish
member.summary: In the NFL, each team plays 12 games in their own conference. 6 games are played against teams in their division(the teams play twice), 4 games are played against a single other division(each team played once), and the remaining two games are played against the other 2 divisions' teams that finished in the same place in their division(ie, 3rd place team from Div1 plays 3rd place team from Div3 and Div4 because they already are playing
